Best cs their is. The fucking is sick, its actually fun and the bots are funny to watch. Hella fun with friends.

Let me say, that i never expected to play a single player version of counter strike...no, wait, all my counter strike games are single player since i do not have friends and i play with bots...kek.

Anyway, the game is actually pretty good, minor AI stupidity apart, it is pretty detailed, has entretaining missions, some easter eggs here and there, AND THE NUKE IS ABOUT TO DETONATE, DEFUSE THE BOMB.

11/10 ign would defuse the nuke again.

It's CS 1.6 with objectives and bots. You play matches against bots, and complete side objectives like kill X amount of enemies by yourself, with a certain weapon and the like. You get more points, with which you can get more teammates. Obviously, there's also the regular multiplayer.

Singleplayer Counter-Strike? HAH! Sign me in!
This was one of my first played games in my life... And im not disappointed at all

An absolute classic. Sunk many hours of my life into this, be it on LAN with friends, on the missions, or online (still some active servers in 2019, 15 years after launch). I personally find some of the graphically updated maps clearer and overall more beautiful than in the original 1.6.

V E R Y affordable during sales, it's a (by today's standards) simple game that you won't regret buying. As it is older (some may say ancient), it runs even on the worst of OS potatoes, so that may interest some buyers.
